column1: 🚨 I've been endorsed by the @NFIB!   As our nation recovers from COVID-19 I will continue standing w/ President @realDonaldTrump to deliver his America-first agenda that will support Kansas business owners & ensure we rebuild our economy stronger than ever before. #ks02 #ksleg https://t.co/8FAjFrc6RF

Great talking to @Great2ndKSGOP about the latest on COVID-19 and my work as @realDonaldTrump’s Kansas Campaign Co-Chair.   Thanks for all your work advancing our conservative causes! Looking forward to working together for many years to come!   #ksleg #KS02 #MAGA #KAG https://t.co/xQzef027HD

Leadership of the @Great2ndKSGOP has not stopped working hard.  Glad I could join today’s meeting to update everyone on Washington’s effort to fight COVID-19.  Looking forward to working together for many years to come.   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/PJQG7qpZbh

Out of an abundance of caution we are postponing our concert with @TreyTaylorMusic until May 22nd.  Please watch the following video for an update on the coronavirus. I am working tirelessly to keep you informed on all there is to know about COVID-19.  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/RHllxGQr1P
